description: The Tignanelli Family is sharing their oh-so-tasty recipes with the streets of Oklahoma, and with their wide variety of high-quality toppings baked to perfection, of course all Eufala foodies have fallen in love with the wood-fired pizzas from Mama Tigs. Their menu includes a selection of specialties, like...Mama Tigs: Alfredo Sauce, Ham, Mushrooms, and OnionsPapa Joe: BBQ Sauce, Chicken, and OnionsAshley Special: Traditional Marinara Sauce, Meatballs, Sundried Tomatoes, and Pine Nuts...and more! And you’re welcome to concoct your own creations with their offering of ingredients such as Italian Sausage, Jalapenos, Goat Cheese, to name a few.So be sure to invite Mama Tigs to your next big party, and allow your guests to dig right into some incredible pizza.
name: Mama Tigs Wood Fired Pizza
